name: The Cartographer's Tale
description:
The Cartographer's Tale is a philosophical-platformer, created entirely by one man in 11 days - sort of! Players are tasked with exploring a VERY dark cave to uncover the story. If it's easy for you to see, then it is highly recommended that you turn your brightness down.

CONTROLLER SUPPORTED

Controls

Xbox One GamePad

Left Joystick - Moves player. - Player can drop through platforms when pressing down on the joystick.
A Button - Jumps / Select
X Button - Use Ability
Start Button - Skips Cutscenes / Pauses Game

Arrow Keys - Moves player. - Player can drop through platforms when pressing the down arrow key.
Space - Jumps / Select
Enter - Select
F - Use Ability
Escape - Skips Cutscenes / Pauses Game
